name: Johann Gottlieb Fichte
main_interests: Self-consciousness and self-awareness, moral philosophy, political philosophy
notable_ideas: Absolute consciousness, thesis–antithesis–synthesis, the not-I, ''das Streben'' (striving), mutual recognition, ''Wissenschaftslehre'', ''Anstoss'', ''Tathandlung'', ''Urtrieb'' (original drive), "Fichte's original insight"
